import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import SideNav from "../dashborad/SideNav"; import io from "socket.io-client"; import "./Qna.scss"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const QNA = () => { const [socket, setSocket] = useState(); const _user = useSelector((state) => state._user.currentUser); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [userMessages, setUserMessages] = useState(_user.messages); const onInputMessageChange = (e) => { const { value, name } = e.target; setMessage(value); }; const onSendButtonPressend = () => { socket.emit("message", { msg: message, id: _user._id, }); setUserMessages([...userMessages, { message: message }]); }; useEffect(() => { const socket = io(); setSocket(socket); return () => socket.close(); }, []); // console.log(userMessages); // _user.messages.map((message) => console.log(message)); return ( <>
